timeline.message:
We can advise a more simple curator migration 

Advice for migrating from Curator should simply be to phase out curator managed indices, since curator will ignore ILM indices:  https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/curator/5.7/ilm-and-curator.html#ilm-and-curator.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            NOTE:  When migrating from Curator, ensure you are running Curator version 5.7 or greater
          
          
            
            so that ILM indices will be ignored as you phase out existing indices.  Otherwise, 
          
          
            
            you may choose to manage existing indices with ILM in the manner described in this
